meanings.definition: The condition of having an abnormal vaginal discharge.
meanings.sent1: She visited the doctor to discuss her vaginoses.
meanings.sent2: The nurse explained the different types of vaginoses to the patient.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about a fictional character with vaginoses.
meanings.sent4: Her vaginoses were like a storm cloud on an otherwise sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The strong odor indicated the presence of vaginoses.

meanings.definition: The plural form of vaginosis, a medical condition affecting the vagina.
meanings.sent1: The clinic treated many cases of vaginoses last month.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often discuss treatment options for vaginoses.
meanings.sent3: The party game featured a card about mythical creatures with vaginoses.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, vaginoses were the pesky weeds to be removed.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the symptoms of vaginoses clearly.
